attr.title: Mayhem Mail
attr.desc: The mail has been scattered! Take on the mail route from hell, recover and deliver the mail to its rightful place! Mayhem Mail is a classic single screen arcade platformer in the vein of Donkey Kong, Bubble Bobble and Mario Bros. with some added puzzle elements.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all game files into the assets folder. You can also use the free demo.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2613420/Mayhem_Mail/) and copy all game files into the `assets` folder. You can also use the free demo.
